definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to invite/to request/to intercept/to solicit/to seek

sentences.english: She is to be costarred with Katherine again.
sentences.chinese: 她將應邀再次與凱瑟琳聯袂主演。

sentences.english: Many delegations of foreign experts have been invited to come and see the TVM experiments with their own eyes.
sentences.chinese: 同時，許多國外專家代表也應邀參觀此試驗線路。

sentences.english: The scientists invited to the meeting are mostly experts on space programme.
sentences.chinese: 應邀到會的科學家大部分是航天計劃方面的專家。

sentences.english: In chapter 2, Jesus attended a wedding.
sentences.chinese: 第二章記述耶穌應邀參加一個婚筵。

sentences.english: DK & Partners was invited to design the whole corporate image for Wyeth's Maternity &Child Health Promotion Centre.
sentences.chinese: 源創建應邀爲其設計母嬰健康促進中心的整體形象。

sentences.english: This were invited to attend the second lanzhou international auto show.
sentences.chinese: 本次應邀參加第二屆蘭州國際車展。

sentences.english: Certainly. Ym a manager. l'm invited to attend the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 當然，我是一位經理，應邀參加會議。

sentences.english: Text: The delegation was invited to visit Zhuhai from Macau.
sentences.chinese: 世界華商組織聯盟應邀從澳門前來我市參觀考察。

sentences.english: I was invited to a bring-and-buy sale yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天我應邀去了一個義賣會。

sentences.english: Assistant Foreign Minister Zhang Kunsheng was also invited to the forum.
sentences.chinese: 張昆生部長助理也應邀出席論壇活動。

sentences.english: I was invited to the concert.
The singer and the dancer are to attend our English evening at our request.
sentences.chinese: 那位歌唱家和那位舞蹈家將應邀出席我們的英語晚會。

sentences.english: Most of the people invited to the reception were old friends.
sentences.chinese: 應邀出席招待會的人大多數是老朋友。

sentences.english: He was invited to paint at Diaoyutai State Guesthouse.
sentences.chinese: 應邀去釣魚臺國賓館作畫。

sentences.english: In nineteen forty-five, Callas was invited to perform in Italy.
sentences.chinese: 在四五年，卡拉斯是應邀到意大利。

sentences.english: When David was invited to King Saul's court, he soothed the king's nerves by playing on his lyre.
sentences.chinese: 大衛應邀進入掃羅王的宮廷，彈琴舒緩王的情緒。

definition: to arrive (esp. of notable person)/to visit (more formal than 光臨|光临[guang1 lin2])
to pay a visit/to call on
